src:
"No vale la pena", Cabrera opina sobre esta iniciativa de Giammattei

06 Nov 2019, 12:42

El presidente electo Alejandro Giammattei, aseguró que cerraría secretarías, comisiones y fondos, por lo que el vicepresidente Jafeth Cabrera, responde que eso deberá aprobarlo el Congreso de la República.
El presidente electo Alejandro Giammattei ha expresado que buscará unificar entidades que tienen funciones similares, como fondos sociales, secretarías y consejos cuyas atribuciones son las mismas de un ministerio.
Cabrera indicó que el presidente electo tendrá que ir al Congreso de la República, pero no cree que se estén dando la condicionantes para cerrar estas entidades, ya la mayoría fueron creadas por acuerdo legislativo.
Comentarios
comentarios
text:
"It's not worth it", Cabrera gives his opinion on this initiative of Giammattei

06 Nov 2019, 12:42

President-elect Alejandro Giammattei said he would close secretaries, commissions and funds, so Vice President Jafeth Cabrera replies that the Congress of the Republic must approve that.
President-elect Alejandro Giammattei has expressed that he will seek to unify entities that have similar functions, such as social funds, secretariats and councils whose attributions are the same as those of a ministry.
Cabrera indicated that the president-elect will have to go to the Congress of the Republic, but he does not believe that the conditions to close these entities are being given, and most were created by legislative agreement.
